tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE speech_to_text_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  audio_file_path VARCHAR(255),
  transcription TEXT,
  language_code VARCHAR(10),
  transcription_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE speech_data (
    speech_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    speech_text TEXT,
    speech_audio BLOB,
    speech_language VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE speech_audio_data ( 
    audio_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    audio_file_name VARCHAR(255), 
    transcription TEXT, 
    speaker_id UUID, 
    transcription_confidence FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE speaker_profile ( 
    speaker_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    name VARCHAR(50), 
    age INT, 
    gender VARCHAR(10), 
    dialect VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE transcription_history ( 
    transcription_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    audio_id UUID, 
    transcription TEXT, 
    transcription_date TIMESTAMP, 
    transcription_accuracy FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE model_training_data ( 
    training_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    audio_id UUID, 
    features_array JSONB, 
    label TEXT, 
    data_split VARCHAR(10) 
);

CREATE TABLE recognition_metrics ( 
    metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    model_version VARCHAR(20), 
    recognition_accuracy FLOAT, 
    training_date TIMESTAMP, 
    evaluation_date TIMESTAMP 
);
